data.expected_result: You should be able to fluently write a comment.
data.short_description: Keyboard disappears and interrupts you writing a comment when adding linebreaks for comments for files
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel/direct message - Click on the attach button - Open your camera roll - Use any image/video - Add a comment for this image/video and add linebreaks via `Return`
